00071   server.sin_family = AF_INET;
00072   server.sin_port = htons(SFT_PORT);
00073   server.sin_addr = *((struct in_addr *)hp->h_addr);
00074   memset(&(server.sin_zero), '\0', 8);  // zero the rest of the struct 
00075     
00076
